= Main goals =

* Extracting documentation from unit tests, supporting behaviour driven development 
* Help to "getting the words right"


*BDoc*

  * should be nonintrusive, no compile-time dependencies to bdoc 

  * should support "existing ways of doing things" and at the same time offer new functionality 

  * should support different languages

  * should work on existing codebases

  * should support all major testing frameworks, without being one 

  * should support different semantics









.

_“If new tools do not fit with existing ways of doing things, no one will use them.”_
